mapper.select: SELECT account_id accountId FROM account WHERE account_id = #{accountId} and account_pw = #{accountPw} and account_state = #{accountState} and account_level = #{accountLevel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(account_id, account_pw, account_state, account_level, account_createdate, account_updatedate) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{studentPw}, #{accountState}, #{accountLevel}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO student_queue(student_id, student_email, student_phone, student_name, student_gender, student_birth) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{studentEmail}, #{studentPhone}, #{studentName}, #{studentGender}, #{studentBirth})
